About the Company: Synthiko Foils Limited`, engaged inmanufacturing, supplyingandexportingAluminium Packaging Foils. The range offered by us comprisesAlu Alu Foils, Lidding Foil, Two Ply And Three Ply Laminates, Blister Foil, Printed Aluminum Foil, Laminated Aluminum FoilandAluminum Foil Lids. These are developed using food grade aluminum, which we source from authorized vendors of the market.
